anya-e1214n:12: Chanda’hānitthamo’kāraṃ-dhātvantānaṃ siyākva ci, yūnaṃ dīgho ca dhātumhā-pubbama’tthapadaṃ api.
anya-e1214n:14: Bhū sattāyaṃ paca pāke gamusappa gatimhi (ca);
anya-e1214n:18: Ku sadde kucchite ṭaṅka dhāraṇe maki maṇḍane.
anya-e1214n:22_0: 4. Vava, lokanavittisu cakkhavutimhi (tu) rukkha (ca) khe thirahiṃsakhaṇe niya, mo’panayiṭṭhi
anya-e1214n:22_1: vatādisa muṇḍisu dikkha (’tha) kakkha-kakhā hasane tura, hiṃsanavuddhigatīsu (hi)
anya-e1214n:22_2: dakkha’danamhi (tu) jakkha (ca) bhakkha (matā) ana, jāladukhesu (tu) dikkha (ca)
anya-e1214n:22_3: dukkha (ca) ikkha disa’ṅka na ko’kha suse.
anya-e1214n:23_0: 5. [A] nikkha cumbane’(pi) sikkha vijju’pādu’ pāsānamhi rakkha guttivāraṇe (pi) uñchane
anya-e1214n:23_1: (siyā’pi) bhikkha yāvaladdhya’laddhisū (pi) vakkha rosasaṃhatesu mokkha muttiyaṃ
anya-e1214n:24_0: [Ba] nakha makha rakha naṅkhāmaṅkharakkhī’khīlaṅkhā lakha vakha ikha iṅkhā uṅkha
anya-e1214n:24_1: vaṅkhū’kha gatyaṃ vakhi makhi kakhi kaṅkhe khī khaye ukkha seke khu khutadhanisu
anya-e1214n:27: Agī igī rigī ligī vagī gatya’tthadhātavo.
anya-e1214n:29: Silāgha katthane jaggha hasane aggha agghane;
anya-e1214n:32: Vaca byattavace yāca yācane ruca dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:33: Suca soke kuca sadde (atho) vica vivecane.
anya-e1214n:39: Paca yāte kaci-vacca dittiyaṃ maci dhāraṇe.
anya-e1214n:41: Puccha sampucchane muccha mohasmiṃ lañcha lakkhaṇe;
anya-e1214n:44: Taccho tanukiraye piñcha piñchane rāja dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:48: Bhaja saṃsevane sañja saṅge (tu) iñja kampane.
anya-e1214n:54: Majja saṃsuddhiyaṃ lajja lajjane tajja tajjane.
anya-e1214n:57: Guja-kuja dvayaṃ sadde akhyatte khajja bhakkhaṇe.
anya-e1214n:59: Bhajja pāke viji bhayacalane vīja vījane;
anya-e1214n:60: Khajī gamanavekalle jī jaye ju jave (siyā;).
anya-e1214n:62: Jhe cintāyujjha ussagge gamane aṭa-paṭa dvayaṃ;
anya-e1214n:63: Naṭa nacce raṭa paribhāsane vaṭa veṭhane.
anya-e1214n:65: Vaṭṭa āvattane vaṇṭa vaṇṭatthe kaṭa maddane;
anya-e1214n:72: Ghaṭi saṅghaṭṭane taṭṭa cchedane muṭa maddane.
anya-e1214n:74: Paṭha byattavace heṭha bādhāyaṃ veṭha veṭhane;
anya-e1214n:81: Maṇḍa vibhūsane caṇḍa caṇḍikke bhaḍi bhaṅḍane.
anya-e1214n:87: Kuḍi dāhe paḍi gate hiḍi āhiṇḍane (siyā;);
anya-e1214n:93: Vaḍḍha saṃvaḍḍhane kaḍḍha kaḍḍhaṇe bhaṇa bhāsane;
anya-e1214n:95: Soṇa vaṇṇe guṇa’bhyāse iṇa-pheṇa dvayaṃ gate,
anya-e1214n:107: Gotthu vaṃse patha-pantha gate nanda samiddhiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:119: Madi balye muda-madā santose madda maddane;
anya-e1214n:122: Vida lābhe dada dāne rudi assuvimocane;
anya-e1214n:133: Dā dave du gatīvuddhayaṃ dā dāne vida jānane,
anya-e1214n:134: Tadi ālasiye bādha bādhāyaṃ gudha kīḷane;
anya-e1214n:139: Sidhu gatimhi yudha sampahāre vidha vedhane,
anya-e1214n:142: Sidha-sādha (ca) siddhimhi dhe pāne indha dittiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:143: Māna pūjāya vana-sana sambhave ana pāṇane;
anya-e1214n:146: Gupa gopanake gupa saṃvaraṇe tapa santāpe tapa issariye,
anya-e1214n:147: Cupa mandagate tapuubbege rapa-lapa vākye sapa akkose;
anya-e1214n:150: Kapi kiñcicale kappa sāmatthe vepu kampane;
anya-e1214n:155: Capa sāntve pu pavane jhapa dāhe supo saye,
anya-e1214n:159: Amba sadde (ca) assāde tāyane sabi maṇḍane;
anya-e1214n:164: Labha lābhe jambha gattavināme subha sobhane,
anya-e1214n:165: Bhī bhaye rabha rābhasse (cā)’rambhe khubha sañcale;
anya-e1214n:168: Sumbha saṃsumbhane sambha vissāse yabha methune;
anya-e1214n:176: Damo dame nama name (atho) sama parissame,
anya-e1214n:177: Yamu uparame nāse ama yāte mu bandhane;
anya-e1214n:184: Cāya sampūjane tāya santāne pāya vuddhiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:187: Tara taraṇasmiṃ thara santharaṇe bhara bharaṇasmiṃ phara sampharaṇe,
anya-e1214n:188: Sara gati cintā hiṃsā sadde phura calanādo hara haraṇasmiṃ;
anya-e1214n:190: Ri santatismiṃ ri gate ru sadde khuracchidasmiṃ dhara dhāraṇamhi,
anya-e1214n:191: Jara jīraṇatthe marapāṇacāge khara sekanāse ghara sevanamhi;
anya-e1214n:193: Garo nigareṇa seke dara ḍāhe vidāraṇe,
anya-e1214n:197: Kura kkose nara naye jāgara supinakkhaye;
anya-e1214n:200: Khala sañcalane phulla vikāse jala dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:203: Dala duggatiyaṃ nīla vaṇṇe mīla nimīlane;
anya-e1214n:218: Ava rakkhaṇe jīva pāṇadhāraṇe (tu) plavo gate;
anya-e1214n:221: Davo (tu) davane devu devane sevu sevane;
anya-e1214n:225: Hve avhāne keva seke dhuva yātrā thiresu (ca;);
anya-e1214n:227: Asa gasa adane ghasa adanasmiṃ-isa pariyese isuicchāyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:230: Kusa akkose dusa appīte-tusa santose pusa posamhi,
anya-e1214n:231: Rusa ālepe rusa hiṃsāyaṃ-masu macchere usu dāhe (’pi;)
anya-e1214n:233: Hasa hasanasmiṃ ghusa saddasmiṃ-tasa ubbege trasa ubbege,
anya-e1214n:236: Gavesa maggaṇe paṃsa nāsane disa pekkhaṇe,
anya-e1214n:239: Saṃsa pasaṃsane issa issāyaṃ kassa kassane,
anya-e1214n:240: Dhaṃsa padhaṃsane siṃsa icchāyaṃ ghaṃsa ghaṃsane;
anya-e1214n:246: Kisa sāṇe kasa gate kasa hiṃsāvilekhane;
anya-e1214n:252: Su sadde su pasavane si saye (ca) si sevane;
anya-e1214n:255: Raha cāgasmiṃ muha mucchāyaṃ-maha sattāyaṃ bahu saṃkhyāne;
anya-e1214n:258: Ruha sañjanane ūha vitakke vaha pāpaṇe;
anya-e1214n:261: Nindāyaṃ garaho īha ghaṭṭane miha sevane;
anya-e1214n:264: Vhe saddamhi hasane hā cāge luḷa manthane
anya-e1214n:268: Tuda byathāyaṃ (tu) nuda kkhepaṇe likha lekhaṇe,
anya-e1214n:269: Kuca saṅkocane rica kkharaṇe khaca bandhane;
anya-e1214n:277: Puṇo subha kiraye vatta vattane cata yācane,
anya-e1214n:284: Kapa acchādane vappa vāraṇe khipa peraṇe;
anya-e1214n:286: Supo saye chupo phasse (vattate) capa sāntvane,
anya-e1214n:289: Sumbha saṃsumbhane jambha jambhane jubha nicchubhe,
anya-e1214n:290: Ṭhubha niṭṭhubhane camu adane chamu hīḷane;
anya-e1214n:292: Jhamu dāhe chamu adane irīya vattane’(pi ca),
anya-e1214n:298: Tila snehe cila vāse hila hāve silu’ñchane,
anya-e1214n:299: Bila bhede thūla caye kusacchedana pūraṇe;
anya-e1214n:302: Phula phasse musa theyye thusa appikirayāya (tu)
anya-e1214n:310: Nī pāpaṇe muna ñāṇe hana hiṃsāgatīsu (’pi)
anya-e1214n:312: Pārakkhaṇamhi pā pāne brū vācāyaṃ viyattiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:313: Bhā dittiyaṃ mā pamāṇe (atho) yā pāpuṇe (siyā;)
anya-e1214n:316: Asa (dhātu) bhuvi (khyāto) si saye sā samatthiye;
anya-e1214n:319: Hū dāne’(pi ca) ādāne havyadāne (ca vattate,)
anya-e1214n:320: Hā cāge kamu yātrāyaṃ dā dāne dhā (ca) dhāraṇe;
anya-e1214n:324: Rudhi āvaraṇe muca mocane rica recane,
anya-e1214n:325: Sica seke yuja yoge bhuja pālanabhojane;
anya-e1214n:333: Sivu tantūnasantāne khī khaye khā pakāsane;
anya-e1214n:335: Kā-gā sadde (pi) ghā gandho’pādāne ruca rocane,
anya-e1214n:336: Kaca dityaṃ muca moce (atho) vica vivecane;
anya-e1214n:338: Rañja rāge sañja saṅge khalane majja suddhiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:339: Yujo samādhimhi lujo vināse jhā vicintane;
anya-e1214n:341: Tā pālane chidi dvedhākāre mida sinehane,
anya-e1214n:344: Sida pāke padagate vida sattā vicintane,
anya-e1214n:345: Dī khaye supane dā (ca) dāne dātva’vakhaṇḍane;
anya-e1214n:348: Kudha kope sudha soce rādha hiṃsāya siddhiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:351: Vidha vedhe gidha gedhe rudhi āvaraṇā’disu;
anya-e1214n:354: Sinā soce kupa kope tapa santāpa pīṇane;
anya-e1214n:356: Lupacchede rupa nāse pakāse dipa dittiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:357: Dapa hāse labha lābhe lubha gedhe khubho cale;
anya-e1214n:362: Lī silese dravīkāre vā gatī bandhanesu (ca,)
anya-e1214n:369: Susa sose bhasa adhopāte nasa adassane;
anya-e1214n:370: 116. Sā’ssāde sā’vasāne (ca) sā tanūkaraṇe (pi ca) hā cāge muha vecitte naha sajjanabandhane naha soce pihicchāyaṃ siniha-saniha pītiyaṃ.
anya-e1214n:372: 117. Su savaṇe saka sattimhi khī khayamhi gi saddane,
anya-e1214n:373: Apa-sambhū (ca) pāpuṇane hi gatimhi vū saṃvare;
anya-e1214n:376: Kī vinimaye ci caye ji jaye ñā’vabodhane,
anya-e1214n:379: Pī tappaṇe mā pamāṇe khipakkhepe mi hiṃsane,
anya-e1214n:380: Mi pamāṇe mu bandhe (ca) lu pacchede si bandhane
anya-e1214n:384: Tanu vitthāre saka sattismiṃ-du paritāpe sanu dānasmiṃ,
anya-e1214n:385: Vana yācāyaṃ manu bodhasmiṃ-hi gate apa pāpuṇanasmiṃ (hi,)
anya-e1214n:389: Cura theyye loka (dhātu) dassane aki lakkhaṇe,
anya-e1214n:398: Vacca ajjhāyane acca pūjāyaṃ vaca bhāsane,
anya-e1214n:399: Raca patiyatane suca pesuññe ruca rocane;
anya-e1214n:402: Sajjā’jja ajjane tajja tajjane vajja vajjane;
anya-e1214n:404: Yuja saṃyamane pūja pūjāyaṃ tija tejane,
anya-e1214n:405: Paja magga saṃvaraṇe gate bhaja vibhājane;
anya-e1214n:411: Naṭa nacce caṭa-puṭa bhede vaṇṭa vibhājane;
anya-e1214n:414: Guṇṭha oguṇṭhane heṭha bādhāyaṃ veṭha veṭhane
anya-e1214n:415: Guḍi veṭhe kaḍi-khaḍi bhedane maḍi bhūsane;
anya-e1214n:418: Taḍi saṃtāḷane piṇḍa saṅghāte chaḍḍa chaḍḍane;
anya-e1214n:420: Vaṇṇa saṃvaṇṇane cuṇṇa cuṇṇane āṇa pesane,
anya-e1214n:421: Gaṇa saṃkalane kaṇṇa savaṇe cinta cintane;
anya-e1214n:423: Santa saṅkocane manta gutta bhāsana jānane,
anya-e1214n:426: Yata nīyyātane gantha sandabbhe attha yācane,
anya-e1214n:427: Katha vākyappabandhe (ca) vida ñāṇe nude cuda;
anya-e1214n:432: Hiḷāda (tu) sukhe gandha sūcane vidha kampane,
anya-e1214n:433: Randha pāke (atho) māna pūjāyaṃ nu tthutimhi (tu;)
anya-e1214n:435: Thana devasadde ūna parihāne thena coriye,
anya-e1214n:436: Dhana sadde ñapa tosa nisāna māraṇā’disu;
anya-e1214n:438: Lapa vākye jhapa dāhe rupa ropaṇaādisu,
anya-e1214n:439: Pī tappane (siyā) kappa vitakke labhi vañcane;
anya-e1214n:457: Rusa pārusiye khuṃsa akkose pusa posane;
anya-e1214n:462: Si bandhe missa sammisse kuha vimbhāpane siyā,
anya-e1214n:465: Pihi’cchāyaṃ siyā vīḷa lajjāyaṃ eḷa phāḷane
anya-e1214n:466: Hīḷa gārahiye pīḷa bādhāyaṃ taḷa tāḷane
anya-e1214n:470: Bhuvādī ca rudhādī ca-divādi svā’dayo gaṇā,
